rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;16f4f757.1503">   <title>The Laban/Bartenieff Archive </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;16f4f757.1503</link>   <description> Please excuse cross posts.<br><br>From: LIMS &lt;susanwiesner@limsonline.org&lt;mailto:susanwiesner@limsonline.org&gt;&gt;<br>To: &quot;DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;&quot; &lt;DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;&gt;<br>Subject: The Laban/Bartenieff Archive<br><br>greetings all! this is a call for support through a crowd funding campaign started to Save the LIMS Archive! (See the campaign here: http://Igg.me/at/limsarchive )<br><br>LIMS is the non-profit organization started by Irmgard Bartenieff to train movement analysts, therapists, educators, researchers in Laban Theory and Bartenieff Fundamentals. The archive complements the Laban archive at Leeds and the collections at the NRCD in that it contains images, videos, documents, correspondence, etc from Laban, Bartenieff, Warren Lamb, Forrestine Paulay, Martha Davis, Lisa Ullman, Martin Gleisner, and certification projects [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T07:09:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;16f4f757.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ba11d3e.1503">   <title>Dance - UCAS Applications and Acceptances </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ba11d3e.1503</link>   <description> Dear DanceHE Members<br><br>Please find attached a powerpoint presentation shared by Helen Thorne (UCAS) during 'Survival of the Fittest?' last weekend.<br>There are a number of very interesting slides concerning applications to dance programmes in the UK.<br><br>The DanceHE Board are in the process of developing a cross programme survey, to explore the complex nature of the application profile in dance.<br>This is especially clear when compared with the profiles for Drama and Music. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T21:50:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ba11d3e.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;af3f428c.1503">   <title>Registration OPEN - Resilience: Articulating 'knowledges' through dance in the 21st Century. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;af3f428c.1503</link>   <description> [cid:image003.png@01D055F9.D9845350]<br><br>Resilience: Articulating 'knowledges' through dance in the 21st Century.<br><br>registration is now open<br>Thursday 9th April 2015, Hosted by De Montfort University, Leicester.<br><br>Book Now: http://www.danceheconference.com/<br>Registration is FREE to all DanceHE organisation members or \ufffd\ufffd20 per person to non-DanceHE members.<br><br>To become a member of DANCEHE http://dancehe.org.uk/aboutus/become-a-member<br><br>Who is joining the conversation at Resilience?<br><br>Guest Speakers [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T21:34:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;af3f428c.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5d35a849.1503">   <title>Fwd: Association of Performing Arts Collections </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5d35a849.1503</link>   <description> Please excuse cross postings.<br><br>From: Chris Jones &lt;chris.jones@ROEHAMPTON.AC.UK&lt;mailto:chris.jones@ROEHAMPTON.AC.UK&gt;&gt;<br>Date: 1 March 2015 16:05:40 GMT<br>To: &quot;DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;&quot; &lt;DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:DANCEHE@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;&gt;<br>Subject: Association of Performing Arts Collections<br>Reply-To: Chris Jones &lt;chris.jones@ROEHAMPTON.AC.UK&lt;mailto:chris.jones@ROEHAMPTON.AC.UK&gt;&gt;<br><br>Dear DanceHErs,<br><br>A quick email to bring to your attention the Association of Performing Arts (APAC), the Subject Specialist Network of performing arts collections in the UK and Ireland: www.performingartscollections.org.uk&lt;http://www.performingartscollections.org.uk&gt;. APAC's website may provide a useful tool in sourcing research materials or subject specialists. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-02T17:37:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5d35a849.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;2b691ed1.1502">   <title>Members Call for Registration. Registration now open. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;2b691ed1.1502</link>   <description> Dear Dancehe Members<br><br>Resilience: Articulating 'knowledges' through dance in the 21st Century.<br>Thursday 9th April 2015<br>Hosted by, De Montfort University, Leicester.<br><br>Registration is now open.<br>If you intend to join us please register as soon. Your fast action will help us finalise arrangements for catering and space.<br><br>Book Now: http://www.danceheconference.com/<br>Registration is FREE to all DanceHE organisation members. Find your department name in the drop down menu for members. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-18T21:42:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;e887db81.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;8aaa4787.1502">   <title>(im)Possible Futures Festival & conference: Does It Matter? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;8aaa4787.1502</link>   <description> 11.03.15<br><br>Vooruit | Campo | S:PAM<br><br>(im)Possible Futures Festival<br>&amp; conference: Does It Matter?<br><br>[https://googledrive.com/host/0ByAQcNAI6oBTMVU4RHFSWnNkd00/ACHTERGRONDMET_ROTS-IPF-WEBSITE_resized.jpg]<br><br>(im)Possible Futures Festival<br>11 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 21 March 2015<br>Arts center Vooruit &amp; CAMPO<br>Ghent, Belgium<br>impossiblefutures.be/en&lt;http://t9m.mj.am/link/t9m/6m706i6/1/TUrPvMz4hLNjF8pnd7cUSw/aHR0cDovL2ltcG9zc2libGVmdXR1cmVzLmJlL2VuLw&gt;<br><br>Does It Matter? Composite Bodies &amp; Posthuman Prototypes in Contemporary Performing Arts<br>17 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 19 March 2015<br>Ghent University, Belgium<br>doesitmatter.ugent.be&lt;http://t9m.mj.am/link/t9m/6m706i6/2/UvYp2FNzAOtnIx7xvR57zA/aHR0cDovL2RvZXNpdG1hdHRlci51Z2VudC5iZS8&gt;<br><br>Pointing their eyes towards the future, Ghent-based art centers Vooruit and Campo together with research center S:PAM (Studies in Performing Arts &amp; Media, Ghent University) team up in a unique collaboration to compose a ten-day festival and a three-day conference. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-16T17:35:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;8aaa4787.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ec7da65b.1502">   <title>28th February - Survival of the fittest? A symposium about Dance, Drama an Music in HE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ec7da65b.1502</link>   <description> Dear collagues,<br><br>If you haven't booked already be sure to reserve a place at our one-day symposium organised jointly with colleagues in SCUDD and NAMHE. It promises to be a stimulating event and hopefully the first of many joint ventures bringing our voices together.<br><br>SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST?<br>Promoting Dance, Drama and Music through UK Higher Education [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-16T17:07:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ec7da65b.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;a3a320be.1502">   <title>Reminder: Survival of the Fittest? Promoting Dance, Drama and Music through UK Higher Education </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;a3a320be.1502</link>   <description> Survival of the Fittest?<br><br>Promoting Dance, Drama and Music through UK Higher Education<br><br>Date: Saturday 28 February 2015<br><br>Time: 9.30am - 17.45pm<br><br>Venue: Institute of Musical Research, Senate House, Malet Street, London, WC1E 7HU<br><br>Cost: \ufffd\ufffd25 (waged); \ufffd\ufffd10 (unwaged and postgraduate)<br><br>How do we ensure that our disciplines continue to flourish in the increasingly competitive environment of UK HE? This one-day symposium, organised by the subject associations representing Music (NAMHE), Dance (DanceHE) and Drama and Performance (SCUDD) in HE, explores some of the issues, opportunities and challenges facing the performing arts in the current climate. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-12T20:59:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;a3a320be.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;7163bd5a.1501">   <title>Announcing consultation on Dance, Drama and Performance Benchmark Statements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;7163bd5a.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Excuse cross posting, in order to reach as broad a field as possible I have addressed the direct membership list and open dancehe jisc list.<br><br>Please find attached announcement from the QAA of a consultation period for the refreshed Benchmark Statements for Dance, Drama and Performance. The information below shows the link to the survey, it is open until 27th March. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-31T11:18:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;7163bd5a.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;94fbdfa4.1501">   <title>Registration : Resilience: Articulating Dance 'Knowledges' in the C21st - 9th April 2015. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;94fbdfa4.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues ( please excuse duplicates)<br><br>Registration for our event in April will open early next week.<br>We are asking Members and Non-members to register so we will have an indication of numbers.<br><br>Resilience: Articulating Dance 'Knowledges'in the C21st.<br>9th April, 2015 hosted by De Montfort University.<br><br>Attendance at the event is \ufffd\ufffd20 for NON-MEMBERS and free for MEMBERS [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-28T20:57:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;94fbdfa4.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;874799db.1501">   <title>REF Overview Reports </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;874799db.1501</link>   <description> Dear Dance HE Members<br><br>The overview reports from Panel D and its sub-panels of the 2014 REF are now available on the REF website at:<br><br>http://www.ref.ac.uk/panels/paneloverviewreports/<br><br>It would be good to share any comments once people have had chance to read the documents.<br><br>best wishes<br>fiona<br><br>Fiona Bannon PhD<br>Senior Fellow Higher Education Academy<br>Senior Lecturer, School of Performance and Cultural Industries<br>http://www.leeds.ac.uk/pci/staff/staff_fbannon.html [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T15:13:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;874799db.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;42f86391.1501">   <title>Survival of the Fittest? Promoting Dance, Drama and Music through UK Higher Education </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;42f86391.1501</link>   <description> (excuse cross postings this message has been sent to the DanceHE Members list and the 'open dancehe email list')<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>Please see the outline details below for a day of debate with colleagues from Dance, Drama and Music.<br><br>We hope this is the first of many joint meetings and a good opportunity to share experience and ideas for future development. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T10:35:24+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;42f86391.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5e02b972.1501">   <title>Survival of the Fittest?: Promoting Dance, Drama and Music through UK Higher Education </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5e02b972.1501</link>   <description> Dear DanceHE Members,<br><br>Please find below notification of the shared event with our colleagues in SCUDD and NAMHE that we spoke about last year.<br>The date is fast approaching and we are still in the process of finalising arrangements but now have sufficient acceptances from speakers to let you know of the location and timeline. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-19T16:59:45+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5e02b972.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5fa4c268.1501">   <title>Fwd: New film book seeks contributors </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5fa4c268.1501</link>   <description> CONTRIBUTORS WANTED<br><br>Silent Women: Pioneers of Cinema (Aurora Metro Books)<br><br>It now emerges that more women were working at every level in the first 20 years of the film industry in the USA than at any point since. We are searching for academics, authors and lovers of the Silent Screen era to dip their quill, and pen a chapter about the writers, directors and stars of the silent era for a wonderful new book due out in 2015. Particularly interested in hearing from people with specialist knowledge in early cinema with regards to costume, technical department and editing.<br>For more [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T08:27:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;5fa4c268.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;222b0c40.1501">   <title>External Examiner for BA (Hons) Dance and Performance, Bucks New University, High Wycombe </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;222b0c40.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br>We are looking for an external examiner to replace our outgoing external, for our successful and unique BA (Hons) Dance and Performance programme, at Bucks New University, High Wycombe, Bucks. The role is for four years, and candidates will need to be available for the academic year start this September. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-08T16:48:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;222b0c40.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ee6c6438.1412">   <title>Call for Proposals: WDA-Americas 2015 Conference & Festival - Hawaii, USA </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ee6c6438.1412</link>   <description> From: World Dance Alliance - Americas [mailto:assembly=wda-americas.net@mail185.wdc02.mcdlv.net] On Behalf Of World Dance Alliance - Americas<br><br>Subject: Call for Proposals: WDA-Americas 2015 Conference &amp; Festival - Hawaii, USA<br><br>Call for Proposals: 2015 WDA-Americas Conference &amp; Festival<br><br>View this email in your browser&lt;http://us6.campaign-archive2.com/?u=114314c7b2763e6366bdaf1f2&amp;id=dfc82a366f&amp;e=a0f9d9f613&gt;<br><br>Call for Proposals<br><br>The deadline for all proposals is February 15, 2015.<br>The World Dance Alliance-Americas is excited to announce that their next Conference & Festival Assembly will be hosted by the Asia Pacific Dance Festival and the University of Hawai\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdi at Manoa\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Theatre & Dance Department in conjunction with the Dance Critics Association Conference from July 26 to [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-17T21:35:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;ee6c6438.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;d6c4ee9b.1412">   <title>A New Year Invitation. Send a proposal by the 5th January 2015: Resilience: Articulating Dance 'Knowledges' in the C21st - 9th April 2015. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;d6c4ee9b.1412</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>We have had a few requests for a little more time to finalise proposals for our meeting next year.<br>In the interest of sanity during a week where many assessments are being conducted and REF notifications are due we are moving the submission date for proposals to the 5th January 2015. Reminder information can be found below. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-17T11:04:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;d6c4ee9b.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;6a3a3865.1412">   <title>Reminder: Resilience: Articulating Dance 'Knowledges' in the C21st - 9th April 2015. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;6a3a3865.1412</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>As the email box fills with tempting activities for the Spring here is a quick reminder about the deadline for your submission to,<br><br>Resilience: Articulating Dance 'Knowledges'in the C21st.<br>9th April, 2015 hosted by De Montfort University.<br><br>The event is FREE to attend for members of DanceHE.<br><br>This one-day event for DanceHE members, researchers, artists and collaborative partners, provides an opportunity to identify ways we can continue to thrive in the UK higher education sector. The day will include presentations from Jonathan Burrows and Samuel Ladkin exploring ways we might rethink the notions of 'value' and 'impact' in [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-10T12:00:25+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;6a3a3865.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;8fd39f0d.1412">   <title>Arts Council shift </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;8fd39f0d.1412</link>   <description> Please excuse cross posting.<br><br>Arts Council Chair signals 'fundamental shift' in approach to diversity and the Creative Case.<br><br>Date: 8 December 2014<br><br>A ‘fundamental shift’ in the Arts Council’s approach to diversity was announced today by Chair Sir Peter Bazalgette, in a momentous speech that placed responsibility on every funded organisation to make their programme of work more reflective of the communities they serve. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-08T21:21:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;8fd39f0d.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;28a2a173.1412">   <title>HEA Review of support and engagement- Your thoughts </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;28a2a173.1412</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>I have been asked to complete an annual review for the HEA addressing the working relationship between the academic dance community and the HEA.<br>I appreciate that everyone is busy but if you have any thoughts that tally with the list below and would like me to include them in the review please email me directly before 5pm on Friday 5th December. The feedback concerns their support and contribution to the discipline in 2013-14.<br>The specific aspects that they are interested to hear about, include. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-03T20:55:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Fiona Bannon</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;28a2a173.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;27bde57e.1412">   <title>Call for Participants for Workshop 1 of AHRC Network 'The changing requirements of beauty' </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DANCEHEMEMS;27bde57e.1412</link>   <description> (CfPs) for Workshop 1 of AHRC Network<br>'The changing requirements of beauty'<br><br>‘The changing requirements of beauty’ AHRC launches 1 January 2015 with the launch of the website www.birmingham.ac.uk/beautydemands&lt;http://www.birmingham.ac.uk/beautydemands&gt; . The network will hold a number of events including four multi-disciplinary workshops (of 15 people), a mini-conference (with keynote by Susan Bordo) and a wrap, policy-focused event.
